headline: REPORT: House Republicans put Hunter Biden’s legal team on notice over business dealings
author: DML News App
sentences:
As the most reliable and balanced news aggregation service on the internet, DML News App offers the following information published by Fox News:
Republicans on the House Judiciary Committee have sent a letter to Hunter Biden’s legal team asking him to “immediately” preserve any records related to any business dealings he was engaged in during the Obama administration as well as records related to his notorious laptop that he left at a Delaware repair shop.

to stop what we consider to be politically motivated actions.’ In another email, the same businessman thanked you for arranging a meeting with your father, then-Vice President Biden, calling it ‘an honor and pleasure.’ The Post reported that these emails came from a laptop belonging to you that you abandoned in a Delaware computer shop.”
Promoted Content
The Oversight Committee Republicans announced on Tuesday, “JUST NOW.

“Jim Jordan, my colleagues and I are ready to see this through to the end.”
The article goes on to state the following:
In the letter, the House Republicans reference a bombshell report from the New York Post published in the weeks leading up to the 2020 presidential election detailing the contents of Hunter Biden’s laptop that suggested he was using his father’s position of power for his own financial gain.

Promoted Content
“This investigation matters because of what we owe the American people: The full history of the collusion and coverup that we know took place in 2020, and the history yet to be written about what we did to ensure this abuse of power can never happen again,” California Rep. Darrell Issa, a senior committee member, told Fox News Digital in a statement after sending the letter.
